td.content: s:patient presents with increased mild excessive thirst, mild increased urination and mild yeast infections over 3 years. pt is a female retired aged 78 Ys. o:Height 61 in, Weight 180 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, appears in NAD a:Type 2 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metformin - 500 mg daily, and ordered fasting plasma glucose.
